channel.title: Half cut trees
channel.description: So I made a public tree farm outside of spawn, I can enforce half cut trees falling under the griefing rule right?

item.title: Half cut trees
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:4, topic:438545”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=541253.msg3965137#msg3965137 date=1333642376]

I don’t know, I’m notorious for unsustainable development in that respect. I just find trees, chop them to whatever amount then leave. Unless it’s in an underground room on your property then I can’t really see any room for rule enforcement.

Especially if it’s next to spawn, you’re sort of asking for it

well i cant enforce it for the natural trees in the area, im just doing it for the tree farm i made, half cut trees would be griefing etc
[/quote]

If the area is well marked off, and it’s clear it isn’t allowed then I’d personally say it was fine. Obviously if it’s just one half cut tree don’t go banning them or anything.[/quote]

ofc ill warn them once or twice, but repeat offences will be deserving of a small ban, like a day or 2? Im aware half cut trees is just a small annoyance, but its a pet-peeve of a large amount of players. Minecraft brings out the OCD in everyone, or so the saying goes.

Read full topic

item.title: Half cut trees
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:3, topic:438545”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=541253.msg3964971#msg3964971 date=1333623461]
I don’t know, I’m notorious for unsustainable development in that respect. I just find trees, chop them to whatever amount then leave. Unless it’s in an underground room on your property then I can’t really see any room for rule enforcement.

Especially if it’s next to spawn, you’re sort of asking for it
[/quote]

well i cant enforce it for the natural trees in the area, im just doing it for the tree farm i made, half cut trees would be griefing etc[/quote]

If the area is well marked off, and it’s clear it isn’t allowed then I’d personally say it was fine. Obviously if it’s just one half cut tree don’t go banning them or anything.

Read full topic
